metadata.title: CVE-2024-11029 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the FreeIPA API audit, where it sends the whole FreeIPAcommand line to journalctl. As a consequence, during the FreeIPAinstallation process, it inadvertently leaks the administrative usercredentials, including the administrator password, to the journal database.In the worst-case scenario, where the journal log is centralized, userswith access to it can have improper access to the FreeIPA administratorcredentials.

criterions.comment: freeipa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
